scripts.build: npm run build:tsc && npm run build:copy-html && npm run build:insert-version && npm run build:copy-static
scripts.gh-pages: rm -rf dist; mkdir dist; git clone -b gh-pages git@github.com:psvenk/AgendaCreator.git dist; rm -rf dist/*; npm run build; cd dist; git add *; git add -u *; git commit -m 'Updated the GitHub Pages site'; git push origin gh-pages; cd ..; rm -rf dist
scripts.____gh-pages-comment: This is taken from the package.json for LearnASM by KB1RD, which can be found at <https://github.com/KB1RD/LearnASM/blob/master/package.json>.
